raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "django-rest-polymorphic" %}
{% set version = "0.1.8" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8a763ab0459b93724d186e101c3b92d0b1916305b6b221f65064c02ebc2267a8

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - django
    - django_polymorphic
    - djangorestframework
    - python
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - rest_polymorphic

about:
  home: https://github.com/apirobot/django-rest-polymorphic
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "Polymorphic serializers for Django REST Framework."
  dev_url: https://github.com/apirobot/django-rest-polymorphic

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rluria14
    - oblute
